axis.help: Axis along which to calculate density and energy profiles

min.help: Minimal projected position for manual binning

max.help: Maximal projected position for manual binning

auto.help: '0' for manual binning using min and max, '1' for automated

type.help: What centers of mass to use: 'segments' or 'atoms'

last.help: ID of the last segment, -1 is the list end
